website_summaries.verdict: This compact car vacuum offers useful features and delivers moderate suction that makes it suitable for picking up small messes and keeping your vehicle tidy.
pros: Has a streamlined design that makes it easy to maneuver
Plugs into your car's cigarette lighter so it's always ready to use
Comes with 3 nozzles for different cleaning tasks
cons: Suction isn't as powerful as that offered by some competitors on our list

customer_reviews.title: The most impressive car vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome! I only a 2018 Dodge Durango that sadly does not have leather seats. I own three dogs and it is just a nightmare pulling out my extension cord to vacuum my truck. I can now just plug this little guy into my 12v car outlet and I’m good to go! The power in this vacuum is as good as it’s going to get for a car vacuum so if you want extreme suction - buy a shop vac. Also the attachments are fantastic. P.s. I own 3 dogs- it picks up hair. The spots with sand in the picture are not vacuumed over yet to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for the price point
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand the reviews stating it’s lack of suction. Yes, it’s not super powerful but it works! I don’t know what people expect from a $30 car vacuum but it works great to pick up dirt and crumbs in a pinch. The accessories are useful and the extra filter is clutch.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad to have such a great stuff in my car!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad to have such a great stuff in my car. Yes, it is not a powerful as my vacuum cleaner in the house, however, it cleaned out all the garbage, which I accumulated over the past autumn and winter in the car. At the end of October my husband and I went to the ocean and as we tried to be neat - the sand was still in the car. Finally, I got rid of it! Now my beauty again is clean, as on the first day, when I bought her))))
customer_reviews.author: Julia Bright

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT AUTO VACUUM, but....
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT AUTO VACUUM, but check you car's fuse box and make sure it's at least 15 amp because this vacuum blew the 10 amp fuse of the cigarette lighter outlet in my 2013 Subaru Outback. HOWEVER, the Outback has a second power source located inside the console and it is rated at 20 amp. This is a terrific vacuum cleaner! Very easy to set up! This baby does the job! I drive for both ride-share companies and make it a point to keep my car spotless and this small but MIGHTY vacuum does the job! A clean car gets better tips!!!!
customer_reviews.author: RIDE-SHARE DRIVER

customer_reviews.title: 12V power source means power within the car
customer_reviews.text: Nice caddy and for the price does a decent job. Not as powerful as a commercial vacuum but if you are one to stay on top of a vehicles appearance, this does a good job of doing so.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewerViewer

customer_reviews.title: Great little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Great little vacuum! I have used it twice so far and I am not disappointed. I got a follow up email a few days ago from the seller, the p.p.s stated to turn on the engine when using the vacuum. I found that out earlier as I had the stereo on in my truck while vacuuming and noticed the sound degrade from my speakers, I started the engine and all was good again. I cracked the brush accessory by accident trying to fit it over the longer adapter, but it seems to still work fine. The carrying case is very nice and everything fits in it.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Garfunkal

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum cleaner for the price
customer_reviews.text: Decided to buy this vacuum cleaner because we have a baby and we need to keep our surroundings clean. We were pleasantly surprised with the quick delivery, packaging and the bag that it came with making it very convenient to carry around and keep at one place. The vacuum itself is powerful, easily cleaned out the sand from the car seats, as well as the other dirt form the floor mat. The chord is long, so you don't have to worry about the back seats and trunk. Easy to clean, comes with an extension to get into narrow spots. We're satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: AsadaFries

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This product was purchased with another product.. I am completing the same review for both...So I purchased this item a while back.. I really needed to clean my car but I rally wasn’t looking forward to it ( it’s like emptying the dish washer)....but last Sunday I woolens up and tackle that job.. the vacuum made things so much easier... I appreciate that it had all the little accessories help do a through job....I also received the car spray and the mop.. so worth it.. I would make this purchase again..
customer_reviews.author: kayeleonie

customer_reviews.title: Mickey mouse junk. Star ratings are misleading!
customer_reviews.text: I should have realized you get what you pay for... although in this case, you get even less. This thing is a piece of junk. BARELY sucks fine dirt out of my truck. I live & work in west Texas where there is dust everywhere. Thought I'd get this for my vehicle since I sit in it all the time for work.. I have used it 5 or 6 times and every time it's a huge disappointment. Pros: None. Really, it's worthless. Barely picks up very fine dust. Cons: A waste of $31, doesn't have any power, bag is a piece too, mislead by so many positive reviews!
customer_reviews.author: Chad H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: This car vacuum is awful, it doesn’t suck up anything. I don’t know if it’s just the one I got or if they are all like this but It makes a god awful sound that makes you just want to throw it in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum has poor suction. I used it once and barely anything was vacuumed up. I would return it, but unfortunately it is too late. I wish I would have use it earlier so that I could have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE- replacement sent - works great!  This company cares about customers.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE. Company reached out to me as I was unhappy with product. Sent a replacement, which works way better than the first one. ??? Anyway, happy with new vac, and extremely happy with customer service. Thank you. Suction is not very strong, and vac only picks up tiny pieces of whatever - clogs easily. Does not have a regular plug - plugs into lighter outlet in your car, which could be handy for some. The only thing I found this good for was to reach in between front seat and console. But, like, I said, it only picks up very small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Deedee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth time or money
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst product I have ever bought online. I read the reviews and they looked good, but this vacuum is a waste of money and garbage It doesnt work. You can barely feel any suction. I vacuumed over the upholstery and you couldn't even tell it had been vacuumed. Also, the plug got scorching hot. I got worried it would catch on fire. Very disappointed and will he returning. Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uh no
customer_reviews.text: As nice as it may look, its suction power is terrible. You will have to go over something at least 10 mins back and forth. Also don't even think about emptying it inside your car. You have to use a little bit of strength and all the things you just vacuumed go flying everywhere. This is the first car vacuum I've bought and I'm considering other options due to how bad this experience has been.
customer_reviews.author: Person

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous design
customer_reviews.text: This is the best auto vacuum I have used. I have only had it a week but already it gets the things that other vacuums have not gotten for me. The fine dust, etc. that collects on the dash and console. This has an attachment that loosens it and then it sucks it away. It also gets the big stuff that other vacuums get, but I can haul out the house vacuum if I want that. The attachments here seem built and thought out for a car as does the design and shape of this machine. Kudos to the design engineers. ThisWorx is well named because it does.
customer_reviews.author: EverettDick

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this vacuum. Does not pick up at all. Even after going over an area many times. Would NOT recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ThisDoesNotWorx
customer_reviews.text: Got everything out of the box, plugged it in the car and it literally stopped working after 2 minutes. During that momentous two minutes and cleaned pretty well the rubber mat in my car. Cord was a great length. However, the unit itself is junk - it's all cheap plastic and if the thing stopped working entirely after such a short time, then the manufacturer has some serious quality control issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nonideological

customer_reviews.title: ⛔Not Worth It!!!!!!🛑
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it! It doesn't pick up anything! It's a waste of money and time!
customer_reviews.author: Fallon Graffree

customer_reviews.title: Great car vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: We used this vacuum on our cars a couple weeks after it arrived. For some background I haven't thoroughly cleaned our car in quite some time and this vacuum did a great job on the interior! The suction is strong, very quick and easy to dump out the canister, and the cord reaches all throughout the vehicle. We are very pleased with this purchase. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jenee C.

customer_reviews.title: No suction having POS... Need I say more
customer_reviews.text: The sole purchase of a vacuum of any kind would be to suck up whatever is dirtying your car, boat, house, etc.... Welllllll... This vacuum has the worst suction power I have ever seen, but to say that, it would atleast have to suck up something.... It dont! DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY LADIES AND GENTS!!! I tried to GIVE this POS away.... GIVE! Nobody wanted it... That speaks for itself
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: ThisWorks vacuum actually works quite well
customer_reviews.text: The length of the cord is not a problem as my car has 12 volt jacks in both the front and rear. It does a fantastic job in picking up big and small debris (lint, dust and hair) alike. Before getting this vacuum, I was considering a large one. After using the ThisWorkx vacuum, I was glad I didn't. I saved some money. The attachment can get into the tiny areas a bigger vacuum can't reach. Another big plus is that the noise level isn't too loud. Cleaning is easy and the filter can be rinsed with water if needed. I am very happy with my new car vac!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: LAND-FILL READY!
customer_reviews.text: Another one of those products that ... - MAKES PROMISES - LOOKS GOOD - and simply DOSE NOT WORK --- you can get more suction - sucking through a straw save your money and get yourself a REAL VACUUM
customer_reviews.author: MILFORDMAN

customer_reviews.title: blown fuse
customer_reviews.text: After about 10 minutes, blew a fuse in my car (2018 Honda CR-V). The cord and plug were extremely hot. Suction was mediocre. Pros: Was packaged nicely and had lots of handy attachments. The bag was a convenient size to just stash in the trunk between uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suction power is not great
customer_reviews.text: The suction power is not so great, the cord length is good let's you go around the car but its not good for deep cleaning its only good for dust on the dashboard I was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jesus Puente

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: The product looks much higher quality than I was expecting. It doesn’t have as much suction as I was expecting from the reviews, but it will be helpful getting small crumbs from my kids. It seems to blow a lot of air from the back/side of the vacuum but not a lot of suction. I love the attachments, and that it comes with a second filter and adorable carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Not enough suction but has a long cord
customer_reviews.text: It got the dust out of the car but the sand and pet hair was still there. It's not even strong enough to pick up my phone. Pay attention to the kpa. I ended up returning it after trying all the attachments. The new one I bought was 7.5kpa and sucked up everything and is cordless that one I'm keeping.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoulda has another option too plug it into an outlet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum! START YOUR ENGINE when operating!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little vacuum. I must address the “poor suction” reviews... YOU MUST follow the directions and START YOUR ENGINE in order for it to operate properly. This vacuums extra long cord will create a voltage drop resulting in less power, less suction if you do not START YOUR ENGINE. I tried the vacuum both not starting the engine and starting the engine during operation. When not starting the engine suction is very lackluster, however when the engine is started proper voltage is transferred to the vacuum resulting in a robust suction; probably more than double the suction power. So... START YOUR ENGINE when operating.
customer_reviews.author: Patriot 24/7/365

customer_reviews.title: Worst vaccume I ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the length of the cord, the cute bag, the nice little air freshener they sent with that i never even used... I was so excited to try my new vaccume. First, do not plug into any kind of extension to your car lighter it will blow the fuze. And second, if you do not clean your car every day, do not even bother buying. It picks up only dust everything else needs coakst into the tube and then shaken down into the vaccume. The suction power is bairly exisistant. I was so disappointed that I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Barely any suction, no power
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. Not enough suction at all. Spend about 20 minutes trying to clean different areas of my minivan and it barely sucked up anything. Plus the filter appeared to clogup really quickly so I had to keep taking it apart to empty it out thinking that’s why it didn’t have suction. The return was a breeze, didn’t even need to box it up before bringing it to the UPS store, so that was good I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Robitaille

customer_reviews.title: It sucks but it doesn’t suck
customer_reviews.text: This vacuums sucking power is absolutely terrible! I though with all the good reviews it would be a good buy but I ended up returning it. It says on the box “thisworx” well it didn’t work. Would suck up ANYTHING. Simply the WORST!
customer_reviews.author: GirlTalk

customer_reviews.title: It sucks that it does not suck enough...
customer_reviews.text: I hate giving 1 star review much as I hate returning an item that really looks good from the outside and how it is being described. Dismayed is my only word for this item. If there is only one good comment, it is the cord length, more than enough to go around even a full size SUV, nothing more. It did not last 30 minutes from the moment I picked it from my porch, to opening the package, to testing it in my car, to going back to my laptop, and going through the process of returning the item. Yes, do not waste your time. The item looks good. But for it's purpose, ironically, it sucks.
customer_reviews.author: rekaks

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok ...
customer_reviews.text: The suction is not that good which is very disappointing. Small enough to get everywhere and the cord is long enough and I have a Jeep Grand Cherokee but the suction isn’t enough.
customer_reviews.author: Briyanna Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Worthless item save your money
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a horrible review for this item I don’t see it was posted probably the horrible words I used...DO NOT!!! buy this. Keep your money also claims it has a one year warranty...worthless as the product. Email came back as undeliverable...Julia you probably suck more than this so called car vac... stopped working after less than two months, only used three times
customer_reviews.author: MEG

customer_reviews.title: Small vaccume,convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and return the vacuum I wanted to vaccume my Honda Odessey,but it was a pain to manage vacuuming all around it’s perfect for other people,but not me it was noisy it did pick up the smallest pieces off the the floor but not all of it and in the hot weather it’s a burden vacuuming but perfect for who has time to vaccume I mean the plug in was a plus, the extra accesories were helpful and the package came on time and great quality. Just had to constantly keep on vacuuming I have two toddlers and they drop everything on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew & Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very little suction power, Aug 2020
customer_reviews.text: I bought this August 2020. Maybe some models/years the vacuum is better than others. The one I got did not suck up basic debris in the car. I don't have pets nor small kids, so I don't have a lot of variety to vacuum up. It would not suck much of anything up. Smashing it into the carpet or floor mats it still wouldn't suck the dirt up, let alone teeny, tiny little rocks. It did get a fragment of tissue. Very, very poor quality. Maybe some of us get duds and others get an amazing product. Mine sucked, and not it a good vacuum way!
customer_reviews.author: DesertBloom

customer_reviews.title: POOR SUCTION! HAD TO VACUUM OVER SECTIONS 4-5 TIMES
customer_reviews.text: I'm really confused as to how this product received high ratings! This thing has poor suction power! Would not recommend this product for anyone look to a quick or deep vacuum session. I had to go over sections 4-5 times before all the particles were sucked up. Too bad, I was really looking forward to this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Suwuh

customer_reviews.title: Warning!  Do not use
customer_reviews.text: The 1st time I used this vacuum it totally drained my battery, even though my car was kept running. HD to call road service for a jump. Thought maybe it was just a coincidence. Used it again last week, it totally drained my battery again, shorted out the cigarette outlet it was plugged into and blew a fuse in the panel. Had to take it to the dealer to these things replaced. And I had to replace my battery for $150. So this vacuum cost Me quite a bit of money and quite a bit grief. The mechanic said it was drawing too many amps.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: False advertising waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is not as advertised 😒 barely has suction, when trying to change out the cheap head parts it litterly falls apart and gets first everywhere, the only thing that was correctly advertised was the cord length. Don't waste your money. I'm gonna try to get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this little machine and I was completely let down. This barely sucked up any of the dirt or debris in my car regardless of which attachment I used. I tried to do the driver's side of my car and couldn't get through it and ended up getting my push vacuum and using the hose from that to finish the job. This thing is boxed up to sit on my garage shelf for the rest of its life. The power is pitiful, it leaves so much dirt behind, and the cord was only a cigarette plug cord which I had not realized. Spend your money elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: NHTFR

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum to use on our pontoon. We have a dog we take boating with us and I was looking for something to help keep the boat clean and I have to say I was disappointed in the suction of this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Walker

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction, portable, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the vacuum for over a week now and it has absolutely came in handy during a much needed deep cleaning of my car's interior (which has not been cleaned for weeks now thanks to COVID-19!). The vacuum was pretty lightweight overall and held its charge for the entirety of my cleaning (we have a SUV and sedan). I felt that the suction was adequate to get even the smallest specks and the tools provided were helpful. We shall see how long the battery life and equipment lasts but overall, happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kuri Ko

customer_reviews.title: Good little vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is a good little vacuum. It’s not going to as good or as quick as a car wash vacuum setup but to do a quick once over it’ll do the job. The cord is more than long enough to reach anywhere you wanna go. Several attachments and an extra filter. The little carrying bag is awesome and allows you to put everything all together.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F

customer_reviews.title: Great vac for car quick clean
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 kids and let me tell you, its impossible to keep the car clean. If you are a parent, you can understand, you take out the car seat and you find a sea of crumbs. This is a great vacuum to use to give car a quick fresh up. Definitely will not clean deeply like an shopvac though. I will keep this in my car to use between car washes or for quick mess cleanups.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi B

customer_reviews.title: I got a new car so....
customer_reviews.text: my old vehicle, may she rest in peace, finally had to go after 16 years. Got a little SUV I can haul the heathen beagles around in. I needed something that doesn't weigh a ton that will do light hair pick up AND clean the ashes out of the immovable ashtray. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Good suction power vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Sucks up dirt well and has a good range of attachments included. My favourite being the brush that made short work of dried mud on footwell mats. Comes in a snazzy bag, which could do with being a little bigger as it was a struggle to get it zipped closed when I put everything back in. Tackles rouge dog hairs with ease. Well made good quality product for the price. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Srini

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking forward to getting this vacuum after reading all the reviews. Once the vacuumed arrived I plugged it into my new car and it wouldn’t turn on. I read the manual to trouble shoot the problem and couldn’t resolve it. I tried it on another vehicle that I have and it did not work on that one either. I did not have a problem with using a previous plug in vacuum similar to this one, so I know it’s not the plug plug in. I emailed customer service with a return email and phone number along with a video of the problem I was having and have yet to hear back from anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This DOES NOT WORX!!!
customer_reviews.text: I finally used it for the first time & did a great job for less than 5 min! Then it just stopped working! We tried 2 cars, 4 combined lighter outlets, all of which work with other chargers, & 1 previously worked with this. Totally regret the purchase, you can see how much I was able to clean with it before it stopped.
customer_reviews.author: heather day

customer_reviews.title: A great auto vac...a must for any auto person
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few weeks....I used to have a black and decker auto vac...this is far superior for several reasons .....First: it comes with various attachments - for all the different surfaces , nooks that are in the car- lots of different extensions Second : the suction power is remarkable - made quick work of spills Third: the cord is long enough to reach the whole car Fourth: it comes in a convient bag to carry it in- I just keep it in the trunk Fifth: it has a removable and washable filter .....This is a must for all your autos to keep it clean...getting one for each of my cars
customer_reviews.author: William Su

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: With all the good reviews I was excited to get this vacuum. I used it and I am thoroughly disappointed. It sucks... and not in a good way. It does not pick up sand, after going to the beach. It can not even pick up dog fur. It overheats very quickly. I had such high hopes for it.
customer_reviews.author: Hamman

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum sucks
customer_reviews.text: Suction power is garbage. Sure you have a long cord to get around the car but it's nothing like it's going to do you any good. It's only really good for cleaning up your car seats.
customer_reviews.author: the fred

customer_reviews.title: Cheap useless junk!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! NO suction. I don't understand all the positive reviews. This thing is weaker than any handheld vac from the 1980s. It barely sucks up small crumbs. There is no way one could do there whole vehicle. It will take you all day...I'll stick with my small shop vac. This junk actually drained my truck battery after 5 minutes of use. Total POS!!! Don't waste your time & money. Unfortunately I'm passed my 30 day return window or it would be going back. Now it's headed for the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Abysmal suction power
customer_reviews.text: Product is packaged nicely with useful accessories, clear user manual and case. However, the suction power is abysmal. It took forever to clean a small car, struggling to lift every speck of dirt. It would have been much faster to drag out the home vacuum cleaner. Unless you need vacuuming on the go, I recommend paying $15 more for a small shop vacuum that plugs into an AC outlet. What a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Kloomnik

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work!
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this in the mail. As soon as it came in, I got ready to work. I followed the instructions, turned on the vehicle, plugged in the vacuum and not even two minutes into using it the vacuum completely turns off on me. I was so disappointed. I tried it on our other vehicles and it wouldn’t turn on. I cleaned it, replaced the filter and nothing. Extremely extremely disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Poor choice
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually write reviews but perhaps this will spare someone from probable disappointment. I ordered this car vacuum and the suction power was nearly nonexistent. The company quickly replaced it for free, I didn't have to return the original one that didn't work. However, even the second one hardly worked. Again, I want to stress that I hard, if ever, write reviews, but I believe this is important. I can't express what a disappointment this vacuum ended up being for me. I hope that you have better luck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: crap
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and it didn't work in my car, so they sent me a second one for free. Great! I tried it in my brother's car and it worked for 5 seconds, then blew a fuse in his car. I have 2 units that are ending up in a landfill. The great customer service does not outweigh the fact that these are just poorly made and contribute to the waste stream. I am most unhappy about that more than anything.
customer_reviews.author: Funkykat5

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: For a deep clean maybe not but this is amazing for the car. I have a dog who sheds like crazy and I wouldn't recommend it for heavy duty either but still, gets the job done for the price
customer_reviews.author: Lauriane

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrible vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this vacuum. 5 minutes into cleaning my car I just quit. The vacuum is terrible. The suction is embarrassingly pathetic. It kinda pushes the dirt around but it certainly does not suck it up. I will be throwing this vacuum away immediately. Please do yourself a favor and do not buy this junk.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Very little suction
customer_reviews.text: i dont know how people find this product useful at all. It barely cleans up normal messes in the car so how in the world can it detail clean which requires powerful suction? probably the worst vacuum i have ever used and that is saying something. If you dont know whether or not to listen to a review just please trust this one as i only do a negative review if i want to make sure someone else does not have to hassle with buying and returning. it does clean but not as well as advertised. pretty scammerish if you ask me. DO NOT BUY. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the good reviews and the price, dont buy it
customer_reviews.text: Lol this little machine i was excited to get, i told my family about it and once it got here and i put it to use it was embarrassing didnt work i returned it now but thought id leave a review for those who need it, ignore the good reviews lol. This its just a joke honestly i think sweeping out the dirt with a hair brush would be more effective. Honestly.
customer_reviews.author: JOCELYN MUNGUIA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Edited to add I got offered compensation to delete my review....I’m not taking it because I think it’s wrong! Also I think if your product sucks then you should fix not have people delete the review.... This vacuum did not have any suction power hardly at all. I would not waste my money on it...I wish I hadn’t
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

customer_reviews.title: Great to have in the car!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I have been going to the park a lot lately, so my car has been extra dusty. I got tired of the dry grass and dirt in my car, so I went on amazon to look for a hand vacuum for my car. The suction of this is great! My car is now looking clean again and I no longer have to tell people to excuse the mess when they come into my car.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: This is a dainty vac
customer_reviews.text: This little vac looks like a champ. It plugs in smooth and springs to life, sounding like a champ. Once you put it to the short hairs of your car's carpet, however, it is my experience that the vac will prove to be a chump. There's no way this vac could handle dusty carpets from baseball practice, grassy cleat debris from football practice, or much more than the dust and dander accrued from sitting still on a sales lot. Two disappointed thumbs down; sorry folks.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Not a strong car vac at all
customer_reviews.text: This vac works for simple things such as bits of cereal and loose crumbs, but not much more. Doesn't have enough power to vacumm up dirt embedded in car carpeting (even in our fairly tidy car) , as normal hand-held vacs do. One review said it vacuumed up pet hair. Any pet hair in our car comes from the clothing of the driver and this vac did not even suck up that hair from the seat. It is not defective, and it's sure a cute little vac, it just doesn't have much power and no real oomph. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AK.

customer_reviews.title: Bad design, bad quality
customer_reviews.text: No 110V power? Not even an adapter? Horrible to have to use my car power to power on. The cord doesn't detach, and it's hard to get all the pieces back into carrying bag. The design on the filter is bad, it just stays in place, no locking. I tried to power on an hit the remove cap button to find the filter and everything I had been vacuuming back all over my car. I wish I could return. This thing is horrible
customer_reviews.author: Chris Adams

customer_reviews.title: Limited suctioning
customer_reviews.text: The suction is not good and the vacuum is bulkier than anticipated. I purchased this for our family car. I’m very disappointed. It works for big stuff like Cheerios and wood chips not so much for small crumbs and sand. Even with attachments it can’t clean between the console. If you need it for just big items it’s fine. The bag it comes with is nice and the cord length is good. I just wish it worked better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed 😔
customer_reviews.text: Great looking product with excellent packaging but unfortunately looks only get you so far here. I was excited to use this on my brand new car as my pet hair gets quite obnoxious to look at! Sadly I’d rather hassle with getting my small shop vac out (which I have to carry) and plugging it in an extension cord after lifting my manual door garage. Not the easiest task! The suction is ridiculously low and does not do the job as effectively as any vacuum should quite frankly. Horrible experience using ThisWorx just to be let down! I would not recommend this product if your looking for an efficient and accurate cleaning solution for your on the go needs!!
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction, don't buy
customer_reviews.text: The filter that came with this vacuum is pretty much unusable after 1 use. So with just the 2 filters provided, you can imagine the mileage of this product. Don't be fooled by the photos of the tiny bristle brush to clean the filter; you really can't clean them out. Despite the positive reviews I read prior to purchasing this product, it really has no suction power and can't even pick up visible dust and twigs from your car's carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Ian G

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Nice case and vacuum is nice and small but it stopped working during first use. The suction was good then within two minutes you could hear the suction get lower until it completely stopped. I checked the plug it was good, I checked the car it was on and running. I will be returning because it stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Nadia Ramnath

customer_reviews.title: Very inferior suction power
customer_reviews.text: I live in Florida and a lot of sand gets in your vehicle. This vacuum is a very inferior product as it barely picks up sand and debris, worst buy I ever made on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: High Hope's for a mediocre product
customer_reviews.text: Coming from using a shop vac, I understand that this style of vacuum was going to be no where near comparable. But I wasn't expecting it to be this bad. I ordered this vacuum based off all the reviews I saw here but man were they fake. This vacuum didnt even have enough power to suck up loose dirt. Let alone actually dirty areas. Unfortunately waited too long to put it to the test and won't be able to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Kishan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage! Don’t purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the attachments and the claims of the power of suction. This product is a waste of time & money. 1. Worked about 5 mins & I stopped to clean it because the suction wasn’t working properly. 2. Finished cleaning- still no suction. 3. The attachments don’t even reach in between the seats near the seatbelt. 4. Also the cord gets burning hot. I wish I would of looked into the bad reviews before purchasing. I will be sending this junk back. I wish they had a option for 0 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Jmatt

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Would not repurchase again. The suction on this is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: rocio

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk - you have to have a cigarette lighter to use it
customer_reviews.text: So this is a complete piece of junk and I cannot even use it... it plugs into a damn cigarette lighter only - who’s car even haS that anymore??? Seriously!!!!! I’d like a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Redbuddy63

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: Ok product. It doesn't have Great suction which i expected from a portable vehicle vacume that is small. But definitely good if you are just trying to keep the vehicle tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Pelfrey

customer_reviews.title: NOT A WET VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mainly to use it as a wet vacuum for spills in my car. IT DOES NOT WORK. Not even remotely. The dry vacuum function may work fine depending on what you need (suction isn’t too strong though), but do not get this if you’re hoping to use it as a wet vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Paloma Casteleiro

customer_reviews.title: Good product for price
customer_reviews.text: Handy portable vacuum. Suction power good but not quite enough for the thick layer of dog hair in my car, which is to be expected at this price. Car needs to be running for it to run.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Penley

customer_reviews.title: Just...Not Good
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 large dogs who shed a lot. One has fur like a husky or German Shepherd, the other has a shorter, stiffer fur, similar to a pit bull. I didn't expect much as far as the fur pickup, but I was pretty disappointed, this vacuum could barely pick up small granules of sand. There is still plenty of fur left in my car. The only reason I gave this 2 stars is because the attachments actually get into the small nooks and cranny's. Though it doesn't pick up much. Wish I hadn't wasted $40 on this.
customer_reviews.author: Faith S.

customer_reviews.title: Good but suction power is limited
customer_reviews.text: I did a deep cleaning of my car, which was full of pet hair. Pet hair is super difficult to get up. I started out with this little guy but the suction was not powerful enough. Also the directions say not to use longer than 10 min before giving it a break. I switched over to my house vacuum to do the first round after using an upholstery brush to loosen the hair. I did a second round with this vacuum to get into the cracks and crevices my household vacuum could not reach. Overall I thought it was a big help with detailing but not strong enough to tackle the car alone for pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Great price for good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this vacuum. It gets the job done and super easy to use and take apart for cleaning. I've only used it once, and it worked great. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because, I have to keep my car running the whole time AND it's pretty noisy. I live in an apartment complex and when I'm vacuuming in the apartment garage, it echoes so that's the only reason.
customer_reviews.author: Katty Likes Things

customer_reviews.title: Great Value In A Car Vac
customer_reviews.text: I take our vehicle to a local car wash regularly as we have 3 kids, 2 dogs... In between pro cleaning I like to keep the car vacuumed and as dust free as possible. I love having a vac which plugs in to the vehicle lighter plug so I can use it anywhere. This Worx TWC-01 has ample suction power and feels well made. It is light enough to complete a full cleaning of our Expedition EL. My previous vac did not have removable filters so this feature is a huge plus. Hoping the filter replacement cost is reasonable.I am very happy I came across this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Soekawa

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work like it ssys/ returning!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work like it says / returning I’m pretty disappointed with Amazon Reviews. I don’t know which ones are true or fake. I bought this after a reading all the reviews and this is a piece of junk. Hardly any suction, more air coming out the back than for suction. Doesn't pick up much of anything without any attachments, when you put the hose on there is hardly any suction at all. Tried it for 15 minutes, not wasting my time. Very overpriced for the for no quality.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Haines

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Suction is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Do not believe the hype. This thing is worthless. Bought it when it was discounted for like $20 bucks. Suction is terrible, it barely sucks crumbs off the seats. Not sure what product the other reviewers received because the product I received didn’t have enough suction to even leave “vacuum marks” in my vehicle. Complete joke. Save your money people and use your household vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t at all what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I just open mine up today and went to clean out my car only to find out that the suction was horrible I would return it but my return window close. I’m highly upset about this unfortunate circumstance mainly because I had high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad unit
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to be too critical of the vacuum because for what it is, it's actually pretty good. For a 12vdc unit, it gets the job done, and I like the carry bag included. It won't replace a full size vac for getting all the sand out after a beach trip but it works pretty good on the little stuff and the included attachments allowed me to get into some tight places around my center console. Overall, happy.
customer_reviews.author: LaneP

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got a used one sure but I didn't expect it to be filthy and the detachable hose thingy is stuck I can't get it out so I can't use the extra detachments
customer_reviews.author: wickedwitch75

customer_reviews.title: This vac SUCKS! Except when you want to vacuum... then it BLOWS!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the vac for about 4-5 months and my title says it all. I’ve adjusted the filter, tried to tweak anything possibly to get some suction out of it but it really is too weak to pick up a couple grains of sand without passing over them 3-4 times. I was going to give it two stars because it’s compact and well packaged and then I realized it’s so weak I can’t and have not only stopped using it, but I have to go to a local car wash to vacuum now. Thank you, NEXT!
customer_reviews.author: Rashmi ramdial

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent suction, really long cord. Love the attachments and the nicely made cloth bag with handle to put everything in to keep it all together. Highly recommend this product. It gets into the crevices that other vacuums can't.
customer_reviews.author: Frenchie

customer_reviews.title: Great product and outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Nice form factor in packaging. I really appreciate that everything comes in its own travel bag so none of your parts get lost. Even more impressive is the customer service. The first email is rather typical with the exception that they graciously thanked me for choosing their problem. What really sets the seller apart is that I have received two emails since then checking to make sure I’m happy with the purchase. Their exact words are, “ If for any reason you're not satisfied, please give us the chance to make things right“. I really appreciate it and they can Count on me buying a few more of these for Christmas presents.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fail...
customer_reviews.text: So I didn't expect this to be super great, but wanted something to clean my car floor. This ended up sucking up stuff but literally not a lot, then it started shooting it out back on the floor. Not impressed, but oh well. I'll just stick to the car washes for now.
customer_reviews.author: Kamille Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Blew fuse in car
customer_reviews.text: One of the most horrible vaccums. I have purchased this product months ago only to have one big problem. It blew a fuse in my new car car when plugged in. I thought it was my car fault so I went to dealership and put a new fuse. Vaccums stopped working too so what did I do? I went to Amazon and bought another one and guess what? It blew a fuse in my car again and I had to go back to the dealership and get a new fuse in. Plus the new vaccum broke again. I didn't even get my money back. I was scammed twice. Horrible product. Will never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Rubinov

customer_reviews.title: Best 12v Car Vacuum, Period!
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks! ;) I purchased this for my Bolt EV for incidental messes. The suction power is more than ample for regular cleanings, and I'm actually rather impressed with it. The included carrying bag, hose, filter cleaning tool, and an extra filter were a nice touch. The attachments work well and seem ample so far for my needs. If your car gets DESTROYED on a weekly basis, use a Shopvac. Not this, it's not meant for that. It's also orange and black, which matches my Bolt perfectly and was a nice touch. I would absolutely recommend this for your car! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: TheInnocentOne

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be happier. For the price... Can't beat it. If you are looking for something that will suck the carpet up out of your car this isn't it. If you are looking for a handy vacuum that is portable, easy to use and just works. Buy now without hesitation. I have a Ford fusion, left the car running while I used the vacuum. Emptied out the filter area twice and cleaned the paper filter after. Was thrilled and amazed at what this thing picked up. You can keep this in the trunk or in the closet. All the tools you'll need. I'd love to have a brush attachment. But beggars can't be choosers.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: It’s all in the suction strength & this failed
customer_reviews.text: Was excited but my bubble was burst pretty fast. The suction is not good for deep clean or pet hair. This item is ok for light dirt. I don’t think it’s worth spending the money on something that is only good for the dirt in the cup holders and side storage compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Lilia Ramos

customer_reviews.title: as with virtually all hand held vacs
customer_reviews.text: I can not recall using a handheld vac that was worth owning, this one is at the bottom of the list. Right out of the box it has almost no suction and only got worse as I used it. I thin I spent 15-20 minutes on 1 floor mat and the driver’s side floor of my car.
customer_reviews.author: D. J--se_

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a bad vacuum. It doesn't suck up hardly at all. And I know it's only a car vacuum but wow it can't even pick up crumbs unless I'm literally touching it. Super useless. I also feel like the strength has gotten worse over the weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Pham

customer_reviews.title: ThisProbablyWorx
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my wife because she needed something to vacuum her car out. While this probably would have worked, she preferred to also be able to use it inside and the power options simply limited use to corded and/or cigarette lighter power locations and she decided after getting it that she wanted a cordless (battery) one....I give it 5 stars because ThisWorx, but not for us. Isn't fair to them for a poor review because we decided to change our minds after ordering.
customer_reviews.author: David Dill

customer_reviews.title: does not have good suction
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why the reviews are so good on this product. This vacuum hardly has any suction to it. Even with the filter completely cleared, and with using the power from my car (when started), it still hardly sucked anything up. I had to vacuum the carpets in my car a second time using a real vacuum after I used this car vacuum. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Livingstone

customer_reviews.title: no good
customer_reviews.text: people who buy stuff on Amazon and giving good review about product that don't work good need to stop and write the truth now i just used this vacuum since i buy it and this so not good i could give my daughter this to play with it got no power whatsoever is like turtle waking there is nothing to this no dam good to it apart fr the lent of the cord sorry i buy it now i have to go and buy a good one for my vichel
customer_reviews.author: Kezz

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a nice box with a carry-on bag. Everything was wrapped appropriately and it comes with all the pieces in the photos. I went to the car turned it on and plugged it in and it works well and suctioned up all the little pieces on the bottom floor for me. For what it is it works well the only thing I wish is That it didn’t have to be plugged in 24 seven for it to work but it is corded as described. The size is nice and small so it can be kept in the car. Overall it’s a great little addition for a car especially for those who have kids who make messes constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Livelife7347

product_meta.title: Portable Car Vacuum Cleaner: High Power Corded Handheld Vacuum w/ 16 foot cable - 12V - Best Car & Auto Accessories Kit for Detailing and Cleaning Car Interior
feature_bullets: KEEP YOUR CAR PROFESSIONAL LEVEL CLEAN! No more crumbs, dust or dirt! With our ThisWorx Portable Car Vacuum Cleaner you’ll be free of any wet or dry messes, even liquids, cigarette ashes or pet hair

POWERFUL YET TINY! Our handheld vacuum weighs only 2.4 lbs but has a high power, 106W & 8.8 amps motor and metal turbine for the ultimate suction power. The 16ft power cord connects to the car’s 12V lighter port, for maximum coverage

CLEANING MADE EASY! The ergonomic design of this hand vacuum ensures you can reach all the nooks and crannies of your car. The transparent trash container makes it easy to empty it and the protective lid keeps the trash inside at all times

WE PUT CLEAN IN SQUEAKY-CLEAN! The car vacuum set features 3 all-purpose nozzles, a carrying bag for easy storage, a special filter cleaning brush and a spare HEPA filter. It makes for an awesome gift for ride-sharing drivers & car lovers!

ThisWorx REALLY WORKS! We’re positive our hand-held vacuum will revolutionize your car cleaning habits! But, just in case you ever have an issue with it, our Customer Support team is ready to assist you with no question asked replacements

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars20,544 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
